meanings.definition: The act of referring to something or someone.
meanings.sent1: During the meeting, the reffings to the previous report were helpful.
meanings.sent2: She made multiple reffings to the book she had read.
meanings.sent3: The reffings to the missing cookies made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: His constant reffings to his past mistakes were a reminder of his growth.
meanings.sent5: The teacher's reffings to the textbook made the lesson easier to understand.

meanings.definition: The process of directing someone to a source of information.
meanings.sent1: The librarian's reffings to the reference section were clear and helpful.
meanings.sent2: Online tutorials often include reffings to related videos.
meanings.sent3: His reffings to the wrong page caused some confusion.
meanings.sent4: Her reffings to the right websites saved a lot of time.
meanings.sent5: The reffings to the dictionary improved their vocabulary skills.

meanings.definition: The act of mentioning or alluding to something.
meanings.sent1: Her reffings to the upcoming event created excitement among the students.
meanings.sent2: The politician's reffings to the new policy sparked a debate.
meanings.sent3: His reffings to the secret project raised suspicions.
meanings.sent4: The artist's reffings to nature inspired her latest masterpiece.
meanings.sent5: The reffings to the historical figure brought the past to life.
